items.title: Explain what the problem is and why it's important
List out open questions and assumptions

items.description:
Expectations for the owner:
- Responsible for setting and meeting expectation for target dates' +
- Post weekly status update' +
- Demo feature at R&D meeting' +
- Ensure technical quality after release
items.title: Choose an engineering owner for the feature
Identify and invite contributors to the feature channel

items.description:
Expectations leaving the kickoff meeting:
- Alignment on the precise problem in addition to rough scope and target
- Clear next steps and deliverables for each individual
items.title: Schedule kickoff and recurring check-in meetings

items.description: There are likely many different efforts to achieve alignment here, this checkbox just symbolizes sign-off from contributors.
items.title: Align on scope, quality, and time.
Breakdown feature milestones and add them to this checklist
Merge all feature and bug PRs to master

items.description:
For example:
- R&D meeting
- Developer meeting
- Company wide meeting
items.title: Demo to the community
Build telemetry dashboard to measure adoption

items.description:
Including but not exclusive to:
- release blog post
- one-pager
- demo video
items.title: Create launch kit for go-to-market teams
Schedule meeting to review adoption metrics and user feedback

description: Customize this playbook to reflect your own feature lifecycle process.
message_on_join:
Hello and welcome!

This channel was created as part of the **Feature Lifecycle** playbook and is where conversations related to developing this feature are held. You can customize this message using Markdown so that every new channel member can be welcomed with helpful context and resources.
reminder_message_template:
### Demo
<Insert_GIF_here>

### Changes since last week
-

### Risks
-
run_summary_template:
**One-liner**
<ie. Enable users to prescribe a description template so it's consistent for every run and therefore easier to read.>

**Targets release**
- Code complete: date
- Customer release: month

**Resources**
- Jira Epic: <link>
- UX prototype: <link>
- Technical design: <link>
- User docs: <link>
title: Feature Lifecycle Template
